Friendly Dog Walking in Brighton

Your Pet's Happiness Starts Here: Trust Waggles and Whiskers for Expert Care in Brighton!

Services & Prices

Discover our furry-friendly pricing options, because every wag and whisker deserves affordable care tailored just for them!

Consultation
FREE
Group Walk
Individual
£14
2 Dogs
From same house
£25
Double Walk
1 Dog same day
£25

Welfare

Passionate about animal physiology and behaviour and welfare, with a background in Biology.

Experiance

Fully insured and registered with Brighton and Hove Council. Qualifications including canine first aid, DBS check, and professional dog walking training.

DOGS

Small sized breeds only. Dogs enjoy small group walks with friendly companions, returning home relaxed. Safety and individualised attention are prioritised.

van

Equipped with a specially adapted, air-conditioned/heated van approved by Brighton & Hove Council for dog comfort and safety.

nature

Committed to environmental responsibility through the use of biodegradable products.

Testimonials

Thanks to Waggles & Whiskers, my dog is happier and healthier. The walkers are reliable and caring, providing top-notch service that I highly recommend

Colin The Sussage

Dachshund

I was hesitant at first, but Waggles & Whiskers quickly gained my trust. Their team is professional and passionate, and my pup always comes back from walks happy and tired. Thank you for the excellent service!

Harry The Corgi

Dachshund

Waggles & Whiskers has been a lifesaver for me and Bella. As a busy professional, I struggled to find time for regular walks, but their reliable service has eased my worries. Bella adores her walker and always returns home content and exercised. Highly recommended!

Bella The Beagle

Beagle

I've tried several dog walking services, but none compare to Waggles & Whiskers. Their attention to detail and genuine love for animals shine through in every interaction. Max is always excited for his walks and returns home refreshed and happy. Thank you for taking such great care of him!

Max The Maltese

Maltese
